          <title>
            <string language="en">Dying phases of the Sun</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sterbende Phasen der Sonne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Phases de mort du soleil</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fases morrendo do sol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fasi morenti del sole</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φάσεις θανάτου του ήλιου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fases que mueren del sol</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the phases of the Sun as it's shine recedes.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">nuclear reaction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">red giant</string>
          </keyword>

          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung stellt dar, daß die Phasen der 
Sonne, während es ist, Shine zurücktritt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre que les phases du 
soleil pendant qu'il est l'éclat recule.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que as fases do sol 
enquanto é o brilho recedes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra che le fasi del sole 
mentre è il lustro retrocede.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει ότι οι φάσεις του ήλιου 
όπως είναι λάμπει υποχωρούν.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que las fases del sol 
como es retrocede el brillo.</string>
          </description>
